name: Zalman ZM - STG1 3.5 g Thermal Paste
Features: [Best Performance: Zalman’s Super Thermal Grease (STG) maximizes heat transfer by eliminating the minute air gap between the heat source and the heat sink caused by their irregular surfaces., Ease of use: The brush attached to the bottle enables easy application and also prevents unnecessary waste of grease., Easy Storage: A sealed bottle keeps the grease fresh for longer time, which is necessary since the bottled quantity allows 10 or more times of use., Type : Non-curing compound, Capacity : 3.5g, Specific Gravity : 2.86, Temperature Stability : -45°C to 150°C (-49°F to 302°F), Thermal Conductivity : 4W/mK]
